00045 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00047 #define GET_MS()  (u32)TIME_TICK2MS(Time_GetTick())
00048 #endif

00051 void UxART_Configuration(void);

00065 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00066 uc8 gHelloString[] = "Hello, this is USART Tx/Rx Polling example. Please enter characters.....\r\n";
00067 
00068 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00070   * @brief  Main program.
00071   * @retval None
00072   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00073 int main(void)
00074 {
00075   #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00076   Time_Init();
00077   if (WaitLSEClockReady(2000) == ERROR)
00078   {
00079     #if 1
00080     // Wait for LSE clock Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00081     while(1);
00082     #endif
00083   }
00084 
00085   if (HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_LSE, 2000) == ERROR)
00086   {
00087     #if 1
00088     // Wait for HSI Auto Trim Ready timeout, do the error handling here
00089     while(1);
00090     #endif
00091   }
00092   #endif
00093 
00094   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00095 
00096   UxART_Configuration();
00097 
00098   UxART_TxTest();
00099 
00100   while (1)
00101   {
00102     #if 0 // Blocking mode
00103     {
00104       UxART_RxTest_Block();       // Wait until get UxART data
00105     }
00106     #else // Non-Blocking mode
00107     {
00108       UxART_RxTest_NonBlock();    // Return if no UxART data, LED can toggle by "LED_Demo()".
00109     }
00110     #endif
00111 
00112     LED_Demo();
00113   }
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*************************************************************************************************************
00117   * @brief  Configure the UxART
00118   * @retval None
00119   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00120 void UxART_Configuration(void)
00121 {
00122   #if 0 // Use following function to configure the IP clock speed.
00123   // The UxART IP clock speed must be faster 16x then the baudrate.
00124   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(CKCU_PCLK_UxARTn, CKCU_APBCLKPRE_DIV2);
00125   #endif
00126 
00127   { /* Enable peripheral clock of AFIO, UxART                                                               */
00128     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00129     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO                   = 1;
00130     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_CLK = 1;
00131     CKCUClock.Bit.HTCFG_UART_IPN         = 1;
00132     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00133   }
00134 
00135   /* Turn on UxART Rx internal pull up resistor to prevent unknow state                                     */
00136   GPIO_PullResistorConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PORT, HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_PR_UP);
00137 
00138   /* Config AFIO mode as UxART function.                                                                    */
00139   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_TX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_TX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00140   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_UART_RX_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_UART_RX_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_USART_UART);
00141 
00142   {
00143     /* UxART configured as follow:
00144           - BaudRate = 115200 baud
00145           - Word Length = 8 Bits
00146           - One Stop Bit
00147           - None parity bit
00148     */
00149 
00150     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00151        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00152        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00153     */
00154     USART_InitTypeDef USART_InitStructure = {0};
00155     USART_InitStructure.USART_BaudRate = 115200;
00156     USART_InitStructure.USART_WordLength = USART_WORDLENGTH_8B;
00157     USART_InitStructure.USART_StopBits = USART_STOPBITS_1;
00158     USART_InitStructure.USART_Parity = USART_PARITY_NO;
00159     USART_InitStructure.USART_Mode = USART_MODE_NORMAL;
00160     USART_Init(HTCFG_UART_PORT, &USART_InitStructure);
00161   }
00162 
00163   /* Enable UxART Tx and Rx function                                                                        */
00164   USART_TxCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00165   USART_RxCmd(HTCFG_UART_PORT, ENABLE);
00166 }
00167 
00168 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00169   * @brief  UxART Tx Test.
00170   * @retval None
00171   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00172 void UxART_TxTest(void)
00173 {
00174   u32 i;
00175   u8 *uPtr = (u8 *)gHelloString;
00176   u32 uLen = sizeof(gHelloString) - 1;
00177 
00178   /* Send a buffer from UxART to terminal                                                                   */
00179   for (i = 0; i < uLen; i++)
00180   {
00181     UxART_TxSend(uPtr[i]);
00182   }
00183 }
00184 
00185 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00186   * @brief  UxART Rx Test - Blocking mode.
00187   * @retval None
00188   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00189 void UxART_RxTest_Block(void)
00190 {
00191   u16 uData;
00192 
00193   /* Waits until the Rx FIFO/DR is not empty then get data from them                                        */
00194   while (USART_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_FLAG_RXDR) == RESET);
00195   uData = USART_ReceiveData(HTCFG_UART_PORT);
00196 
00197   #if 1 // Loop back Rx data to Tx for test
00198   UxART_TxSend(uData);
00199   #endif
00200 }
00201 
00202 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00203   * @brief  UxART Rx Test - Non-Blocking mode
00204   * @retval None
00205   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00206 void UxART_RxTest_NonBlock(void)
00207 {
00208   u16 uData;
00209 
00210   /* Waits until the Rx FIFO/DR is not empty then get data from them                                        */
00211   if (USART_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_FLAG_RXDR) == SET)
00212   {
00213     uData = USART_ReceiveData(HTCFG_UART_PORT);
00214 
00215     #if 1 // Loop back Rx data to Tx for test
00216     UxART_TxSend(uData);
00217     #endif
00218   }
00219 }
00220 
00221 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00222   * @brief  UxART Tx Send Byte.
00223   * @param  Data: the data to be transmitted.
00224   * @retval None
00225   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00226 void UxART_TxSend(u16 Data)
00227 {
00228   while (USART_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_UART_PORT, USART_FLAG_TXC) == RESET);
00229   USART_SendData(HTCFG_UART_PORT, Data);
00230 }
00231 
00232 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00233   * @brief  LED Demo.
00234   * @retval None
00235   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00236 void LED_Demo(void)
00237 {
00238   static u32 uDelay = 0;
00239 
00240   uDelay++;
00241 
00242   if (uDelay == 200000)
00243   {
00244     HT32F_DVB_LEDToggle(HT_LED1);
00245     uDelay = 0;
00246   }
00247 }
00248 
00249 #ifdef HTCFG_HSI_AUTO_TRIM_BY_LSE
00250 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00251   * @brief  Wait LSE Clock Ready
00252   * @retval None
00253   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00254 ErrStatus WaitLSEClockReady(u32 uTimeout_ms)
00255 {
00256   u32 start=GET_MS();
00257 
00258   while (CKCU_GetClockReadyStatus(CKCU_FLAG_LSERDY) == RESET)
00259   {
00260     if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00261     {
00262       return ERROR;
00263     }
00264   }
00265 
00266   return SUCCESS;
00267 }
00268 
00269 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00270   * @brief  Auto Trim by LSE configuration.
00271   * @retval None
00272   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00273 ErrStatus HSIAutoTrimConfig(CKCU_ATC_TypeDef CLKSRC, u32 uTimeout_ms)
00274 {
00275   u32 start;
00276   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimClkConfig(CLKSRC);
00277   CKCU_HSIAutoTrimCmd(ENABLE);
00278 
00279   start=GET_MS();
00280   if (uTimeout_ms != 0)
00281   {
00282     while (CKCU_HSIAutoTrimIsReady() == FALSE)
00283     {
00284       if (GET_MS() - start > uTimeout_ms)
00285       {
00286          return ERROR;
00287       }
00288     }
00289   }
00290 
00291   return SUCCESS;
00292 }
00293 #endif

00306      Debug message can be added here.
00307      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00308   */
00309 
00310   while (1)
00311   {
00312   }
00313 }
